{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = DragonExplosion | class = DragonExplosion | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: DragonExplosion
{{desc}} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR DragonExplosion { {{Property|Radius}} 8 {{Property|Height}} 8 {{Property|DamageType}} "Fire" +{{Flag|NOBLOCKMAP}} +{{Flag|NOTELEPORT}} +{{Flag|INVISIBLE}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add {{Property|DeathSound}} "DragonFireballExplode" States { Spawn: CFCF Q 1 Bright CFCF Q 4 Bright [[A_UnHideThing]] CFCF R 3 Bright [[A_Scream]] CFCF S 4 Bright CFCF T 3 Bright [[A_Explode]](80, 128, 0) CFCF U 4 Bright CFCF V 3 Bright CFCF W 4 Bright CFCF X 3 Bright CFCF Y 4 Bright CFCF Z 3 Bright Stop } }
